Transaction Tracker

Team:

  • Lena Bojc
  • Vivien Štampfer
  • Jaša Rakun
  • Teodor Vrhovnik

Transaction Tracker is a user-friendly web application designed to help you take control of your finances effortlessly. With its intuitive interface and powerful features, it enables you to track, categorize, and manage your expenses and income, keeping your financial life organized and stress-free.

Key Features:

  • Track Your Transactions:
    • Log all your income and expenses in one place.
    • View detailed information about each transaction, including its name, amount, category, and date.
  • Organize with Categories:
    • Create custom categories to classify your spending and earnings (e.g., "Groceries," "Rent," "Entertainment").
    • Easily manage categories by adding or deleting them as needed.
  • Edit and Delete:
    • Update transaction details if something changes.
    • Remove transactions or categories that you no longer need.

How It Works:

  1. Log Your Transactions: Enter income or expenses with details like amount, category, and date.
  2. Organize and Review: Use categories to group similar transactions for easy tracking.
  3. Stay on Top of Your Finances: Get a clear view of where your money is going and make smarter financial decisions.

This app is perfect for anyone looking for a simple yet effective way to manage their personal budget and take control of their financial health!
